description.text:
Did you find any $(b;spring)information$()?
 What are you standing around for then? Go look! We need to succeed, or $(b;summer)Queen Titania$() will have our heads!
 - The pixie starts digging through a pile of books -
 'How to make sheep fly!'...Nope! 'Concerning Rabbit Folk'....Nope! 'How to make farming a delight' ....Really? 'The mystical art of agriculture'....This must be the Spring and Autumn Pixie section!

So the $(b;winter)Shadow Court$() was sealed in the end, by these $(b;spring)End Crystals$(). 
They where scattered across the world....The enderman took the Elytra to their $(b;winter)Queen Morgana$() in the End.
 If we are to retrieve the Elytra who are to obtain all the End Crystals so we can open a portal to the End! Sound easy enough!
